function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Widespread use of community volunteers without financial support","Impact":"Ineffective community health systems and lack of monitoring support","Mitigation":"Invest in salaried outreach workers, monitoring support, and financial resources for community health systems","Technologies":"Health information systems, monitoring technologies, financial management systems","People":"Community volunteers, outreach workers, and at-risk communities","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations, and public health advocates"},{"Description":"Normalization of existing disease patterns and organizational methods","Impact":"Inability to adapt to new disease patterns and changing global conditions","Mitigation":"Invest in local public services, infrastructure, surveillance, outreach, and staff capacity to address new disease patterns","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, public health infrastructure, data analytics systems","People":"Local public service providers, health system managers, and at-risk communities","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health organizations, and research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate community participation and empowerment","Impact":"Limited ownership, exclusion, and lack of empowerment in community health programs","Mitigation":"Promote genuine community participation, invest in community empowerment, and allocate resources for capacity building","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, participatory monitoring tools, capacity building technologies","People":"Community members, program planners, and health system administrators","Owner":"NGOs, community organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
